statements: SELECT * FROM payments WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT payment_id, amount, currency FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT payment_date, payment_status FROM payments WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE gateway_id = 1 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, amount, payment_status FROM payments WHERE payment_status = 'Success';
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_status FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 AND currency = 'USD' ORDER BY payment_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_payments FROM payments WHERE payment_status = 'Completed' GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_payments > 5 ORDER BY total_payments DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT currency FROM payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND payment_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY payment_id OFFSET 5 LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways;
SELECT gateway_name, gateway_type FROM payment_gateways WHERE gateway_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM third_party_apis WHERE api_version = 'v2';
SELECT api_name FROM third_party_apis WHERE api_id = 3;
SELECT api_name, api_endpoint FROM third_party_apis WHERE integration_key IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways;
SELECT gateway_name, api_key FROM payment_gateways ORDER BY gateway_name DESC;
SELECT gateway_id, gateway_name, gateway_type FROM payment_gateways WHERE gateway_type = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM third_party_apis WHERE api_version = 'V1.0' AND api_name LIKE 'Payment%';
SELECT api_id, api_name, api_endpoint FROM third_party_apis WHERE api_endpoint IS NOT NULL ORDER BY api_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways;
SELECT gateway_name, gateway_type FROM payment_gateways ORDER BY gateway_name DESC;
SELECT gateway_name, api_key FROM payment_gateways WHERE gateway_type='Online';
SELECT * FROM third_party_apis LIMIT 3;
SELECT api_name, api_type, integration_date FROM third_party_apis WHERE api_type='REST';
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways WHERE gateway_id = 1;
SELECT gateway_name, gateway_type FROM payment_gateways WHERE integration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM third_party_apis WHERE api_type = 'REST API' ORDER BY api_name DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT payment_gateways.gateway_name, third_party_apis.api_name, payment_transactions.amount FROM payment_transactions JOIN payment_gateways ON payment_transactions.gateway_id = payment_gateways.gateway_id JOIN third_party_apis ON payment_transactions.api_id = third_party_apis.api_id WHERE payment_transactions.status = 'SUCCESS' AND payment_transactions.amount > 100;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways;
SELECT id, api_key, gateway_name FROM payment_gateways ORDER BY gateway_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM third_party_apis WHERE api_name = 'PayPal';
SELECT id, api_name, api_url FROM third_party_apis WHERE api_url LIKE '%api%';
SELECT id, amount, payment_status FROM payment_transactions WHERE payment_status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways;
SELECT id, gateway_name FROM payment_gateways WHERE gateway_name = 'PayPal';
SELECT * FROM third_party_apis ORDER BY api_name DESC;
SELECT id, api_url FROM third_party_apis WHERE api_name = 'Stripe';

SELECT pt.id, pt.amount, pg.gateway_name, ta.api_name FROM payment_transactions pt JOIN payment_gateways pg ON pt.gateway_id = pg.id JOIN third_party_apis ta ON pt.api_id = ta.id WHERE pt.amount > 1000 ORDER BY pt.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, payment_method FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT gateway_id, gateway_name, currency FROM payment_gateways WHERE currency = 'USD' ORDER BY gateway_id;
SELECT transaction_id, log_message FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM third_party_apis WHERE api_name LIKE '%payment%' ORDER BY api_id;
